hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Song of Time#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Kokiri Forest# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #an Ice Trap#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals #ReDeads# guarding a chest.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to the #Shadow Medallion#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Shadow Temple#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #an Ice Trap#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that ##the Bottom of the Well## has #6# major items.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #a Fire Temple Small Key# can be found in #the Market#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: You thought it would be a useful hint, but it was me, Junk Hint!

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #a Fire Temple Small Key# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path to the #Zora Sapphire#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #the Shadow Temple Boss Key#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Hidden Ceiling Chest

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Castle# is a foolish choice.

LH (Lab).text: They say that ##the Water Temple## has #9# major items.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that ##the Fire Temple## has #6# major items.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Song of Time#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that a #giant pot in the Shadow Temple# holds #Magic Beans#.

SFM (Saria).text: Why are you asking me? I don't have any answers! I'm just as confused as you are!

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Map of Jabu Jabu's Belly# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #a Water Temple Small Key# can be found in #Goron City#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Darunia's dance# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Deku Shield#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path of #the hero#.

ZF (Jabu).text: That's a nice wall you got there. Would be a shame if I just... clipped right through that.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #a Strength Upgrade#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.
